long_description: The 3-in-1 design of the REI Switchback gloves includes touch-screen compatible liner gloves and waterproof shells that can be worn together or separate to keep your hands warm in all weather. Waterproof, breathable REI Elements(R) technology in the shells keeps hands dry while you backcountry ski, traverse glaciers and play in the snow. Removable fleece liner gloves keep hands warm in winter; wear just the liner gloves for jobs requiring greater dexterity. Liner gloves have material in the thumbs and forefingers that lets you control your touch-screen devices so you can send texts and surf the web without removing the gloves. Grippy palms on the shells handle ice tools and ski poles with ease. Soft fabric on the thumbs gives you a gentle place to wipe your nose. Wrist cinches and gauntlet closures are easy to operate with one hand. Removable leashes secure the REI Switchback gloves to your wrists.
